title: Becca Interviews Grace! The blogging biz, dating stories, + more!
itunes:title: Becca Interviews Grace! The blogging biz, dating stories, + more!
description:
For this month’s “Just Us” episodes, Becca had the idea to interview each other! This week Becca interviews Grace and in two weeks, Grace will interview Becca. We crowdsourced the questions from you and had so much fun interviewing each other.

You already know Grace but today she’s answering your questions. What really goes into working for yourself as an influencer, the nitty gritty behind choosing brands to work with, how sponsorships work, testing products, and even turning down brands she doesn’t like (awkward!). She shares some of her best dating advice and tells some juicy stories too! We chat about her love of Becca’s cooking, her work ethic, her love affair with Charleston, and of course her cat, Tyrion too! 

Products Mentioned:

  • Farmacy Cleansing Balm
  • Dr. Augustinus Bader The Rich Cream
  • Weleda Skin Food & Skin Food Light  (under $30)
  • Olay Retinol Serum 
  • Olay Retinol Eye Cream 
  • Seaweed Bath Co. Face Scrub (under $30)
  • Glossier Lash Slick (under $30)
  • L’Oreal Lash Paradise (under $30)
  • L’Oreal Liquid Lipstick (under $30)
  • Ilia Cosmetics
  • Kosas Cosmetics
  • W3ll People Bronzer

 

Store Mentioned:

  • Ron Robinson Gnome

 

Podcast Mentioned:

  • Terrible, Thanks for Asking

 

Obsessions:

  • Bow and Drape Sweatshirts (for Dogs AND Cats, too!)
  • Hourglass: Scattered Light  Eyeshadow

 

Instagram Obsessions:

  • @januaryjones
  • @noraborealis

 

Books Mentioned:

  • City of Girls by Elizabeth Gilbert
  • One of us is Next by Karen M. McManus (sequel to: One of Us is Lying)
  • American Dirt by Jeanine Cummins
  • Deadly Little Scandals by Jennifer Lynn Barnes  (sequel to: Little White Lies) 
  • Klutz Books!

 

December Book Club Pick:

  • One Day in December by Josie Silver

 

Sponsors: 

  • Night: Go to discovernight.com and get 20% off with code BOP20 at checkout.
  • Away: Visit awaytravel.com/BOP enter code BOP at checkout for $20 off.
  • Equilibria: Go to equilbriawomen.com and enter code BOP at check out for 15% off your first order (the beginner box is not included in this offer)

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more!

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast. Follow Grace on Instagram @graceatwood and Becca @beccamfreeman.
